interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: The Real Housewives of Orange County: Season 1 Review Date: 2014/11/28 Store: Jeana Tomasino (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['Desperate for more housewife drama? Then get ready for addictive, indulgent fun with Season One of Bravo\'s hit sensation, The Real Housewives of Orange County! Join five real-life ladies of leisure—Jo, Jeana, Lauri, Vicki and Kimberly—for an all-access pass inside their exclusive planned community. Whether they\'re sharing cocktails, shopping trips, travel plans or Botox treatments, these stylish women espose the realities of living in Southern California luxury! Available on DVD for the first time, this must-own 2-disc set includes every revealing episode from the first season, plus the can\'t-miss reunion special. For the best guilty pleasure entertainment around, take home this sensation that the New York Daily News calls "utterly" addictive.'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Television, DVD Movie, Television/Reality Shows, Blu-ray Movie', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MOV-REALHWORANG', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '5 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: I wish this show was available on Prime Instant but it's not so I bought the dvd (cheaper than 1.99 pay per view).
RHOC is the only version I watch. It was great to see the beginning again. Review Title: It was great to see the beginning again Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Chasing Dreams Sean Roche & Therese Conte (Director) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Featured Categories ["When Gavin is faced with the decision to stay with the family farm or take a crack at a career in baseball, he is fueled by his older brother's success and cheers of his invalid brother to wind up and take a swing."] {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'Sean Roche & Therese Conte', 'Run time': '96 minutes', 'Date First Available': 'September 21, 2004', 'Actors': 'David G. Brown, John Fife, Jim Shane, Lisa Kingston, Kevin Costner', 'Studio': 'Prism/IRC'} I buy all of Kevin's movies, so this one was a must buy, seeing as he is on the cover. I watched it, he is on two scenes MAX. They just have him on a cover to help sell the movie. I barely remember anything from this movie, so unless you're a fan of the kid in the movie, I wouldn't get it for Kevin Costner. Nothing memorable Just My Luck Comedy, Fantasy, Cerebral, Fantastic ["Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his."] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Donald Petrie'], 'Producers': ['Arnold Rifkin', 'Bruce Willis', 'Arnon Milchan'], 'Starring': ['Lindsay Lohan', 'Chris Pine', 'Samaire Armstrong']} Second time I have seen this. It's predictable to some degree but cute if you like Chris or Lindsay. I've always been a fan of her as an actress and musician. Chris is just adorable and does well with Lindsay in this. profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user maintains a diverse taste in movies, with a pronounced affection for comedy and fantasy. Their recent purchase highlights a growing interest in reality television, particularly nostalgic series that showcase personal dynamics and drama, reflecting their connection to iconic storytelling.

- **Actor Affinity:** The user continues to demonstrate a strong preference for notable actors, now extending to reality television personalities. This suggests that their affinity for star power transcends traditional film and scripted television, influencing their viewing habits across various formats.

- **Decision-Making:** Impulsive purchasing behavior persists, particularly when favorite personalities, regardless of the genre, are involved. The user gravitates towards content that features familiar faces, even in non-traditional formats like reality shows.

- **Satisfaction Level:** The user exhibits low tolerance for predictable narratives but embraces familiar shows that evoke nostalgia. Their recent engagement affirms a willingness to revisit early seasons and beginnings of popular series.

- **Review Attitude:** Known for being direct in their reviews, the user appreciates well-crafted moments and character dynamics even within formulaic formats. Their latest feedback emphasizes enjoyment of nostalgic content, indicating positive sentiments toward early portrayals.

- **Overall Rating:** The user distinguishes between star appeal and production quality, increasingly valuing engaging performances that invoke fond memories, even when narratives may lack depth.

In summary, the user continues to balance nostalgia and star appeal, now incorporating reality television into their eclectic mix of favored entertainment.
